location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to John Elphinston, Accountant General, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage; a hole in f. 26v has obscured much of the address, though it is still possible to identify the intended recipient and a hole in f. 27 obscures much of the body of the letter on this folio, which makes the text difficult to read.

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing the Quick and Dead Stocks (not present) up to the 31 July 1807, monthly disbursements and accounts (also not present) concerning the sale of bales of wool at Bushire.
